features: SMOOTHS & TIGHTENS: Fast absorbing body cream for your bum bum, legs, tummy - and all over - contains Guaraná to tighten and smooth the appearance of skin.
HYDRATES & SOFTENS: Brazilian Beauty Blend of Cupuaçu Butter, Açaí Oil, and Coconut Oil softens while a light mica shimmer creates an all-over highlighting gorgeous glow.
DELICIOUS FRAGRANCE: Pistachio and Salted Caramel fragranced body lotion cream. Non sticky and non greasy.

FORMULATED WITHOUT: Cruelty free, vegan, gluten free, soy free, paraben free, free of artificial colorant, 5 free, 3 free, phthalate free, paraben free, no PEGs, talc free, sulfate free, mineral oil free, nut free.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brazilian Bum Bum Cream Bum Bum Body Scrub Brazilian 4-Play Moisturizing Shower Gel Cheirosa '62 Body Fragrance Mist Triple Brazilian Butter Hair Repair Treatment Cheirosa '62 ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ What is it? This Allure Reader's Choice award winning all-over Brazilian Bum Bum cream is a fan favorite and must have for smooth, moisturized, delicious skin. Ultra-fine body scrub and spa-worthy treat gently exfoliates and nourishes with a microbead-free blend for the soft, summer-ready skin we love all year round. This sulfate-free moisturizing shower cream-gel powered with Brazilian extracts will cleanse and nourish skin. Inspired by the addictive scent of our Brazilian Bum Bum Cream, Brazilian Crush Fragrance Mist is intoxicating and can be used on body, hair, and lingerie. Our mighty hair mask combines a medley of Brazilian butters - Cupuaçu, Murumuru, and Tucumã - for intensive hydration, deep nourishment, and increased resistance to hair breakage. Brazilian Babe Benefits Deliciously scented and fast-absorbing, this body cream helps smooth and visibly tighten the appearance of skin. This body smoothing blend of crushed cupuaçu seeds, sugar crystals, caffeine-rich guaraná and nourishing coconut oil will leave skin smooth and soft. A blend of Cupuaçu Butter, Coconut Oil, and Açai Oil nourish and pamper every inch of your skin. Coconut Oil moisturizes and softens skin while Açai Oil bathes it in anti-oxidants. Sunny yet seductive, the warm scent is bursting with enticing layers of Pistachio and Salted Caramel to keep you cheirosa from sunrise 'til sunset. This concentrated formula includes our proprietary SOL Seal Technology to build amazing hair strength, repair split ends, and prevent future damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really works for me!
reviews.reviewText: This cream has been hyped quite a bit so finally decided to try. The scent is amazing, sweet warm vanilla type of smell. I even got the body spray cause i love it so much. Ive been rubbing every night on hips, thighs, and bum bum. It really moisturizes and softens. Absorbs quickly. Ive been doing work outs along with this and gives me a really smooth tight look. I noticed a difference after about 4 days in my skin. The price is worth it for me. The cost is biggest downside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little expensive for the size
reviews.reviewText: First time buyer of this cream, but I must say in just 2 uses my skin is softer than it’s EVER been!!! It smells good, not as good as the mist but it’s close. I will be restocking on this product when I begin to run low I should have gotten the bigger size but I didn’t know if I’d like it or not. If you’re considering buying, I’d go for the bigger one because it does amazing things to your skin!!! I’m a huge fan

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The appearance is very eye appealing and the product looks good. The texture of the lotion is very much like the original. I’m sure it’s the original brand lotion. There is no stickiness to the lotion that I’ve noticed. I just mostly love the smell. When applying the lotion after getting out of the shower, it feels so luxurious to lather on and the smell fills my whole bathroom. The smell isn’t overwhelming but it’s there. I just only wished the smell lasted a bit longer. It seems to run out quite quickly and you have to reapply. I love the travel size. If you used it a lot however you’d want to buy the bigger size. This smaller size will not last very long say if used everyday. I love the travel size because it works for what I need. Just buy it! You’ll fall in love like I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a miracle, but a good smelling moisturizer.
reviews.reviewText: I can't say I've noticed any changes in my skin than any other high-quality moisturizer than I've used before. No tightening/firming or change in appearance...which is disappointing for a product that costs 3x what my normal product costs for the volume. The product does have a nice silky, whipped feel and smells quite nice. But I find it smells stronger than I really like, so I don't use it before work since I work where strong scents are discouraged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff!!
reviews.reviewText: Great product! Smells amazing, really has a tightening effect on the skin, and keeps skin smooth and hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am using this on extremely dry skin on my hands and so far it feels satiny and my skin isn't hurting anymore. I usually do not like smells like vanilla and things like that, but reading the reviews i decided to try a small container. I LOVE the smell of this. It's not overpowering and it isn't one of those smells that 'gets in your throat'. If you know what I mean then you get it (happens to me with smells like vanilla & maple). It is a very soft smell and I love this stuff. When I get close to running out I'm going to order it again. Thank you all for sharing your reviews otherwise I may not have tried this!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Way too much money for no obvious results. I love the smell! The container is small and if it's supposed to provide any appearance of tightening, it does not. It is a nice, smooth, no greasy formula and again, it smells fantastic but it is just way too expensive for what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m still not entirely sure this actually works on cellulite, but it smells great and moisturizes

La crema es muy buena. Huele delicioso y en seguida sientes tu piel muy humectada. El problema es el precio, sobre todo aquí. Es mucho más barata en Sephora (me di cuenta después de haberla comprado).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cream smells gorgeous and absorbs into skin quickly - there is no greasy feeling just lovely soft skin.
Jag har köpt dessa tidigare i butik och denna luktar inte riktigt samma. Kan den vara fejk eller gammal? Rekommenderar ej att köpa

reviews.reviewTitle: C'est extraordinaire, ça sens super bon.
reviews.reviewText: J'utilise sur les fessiers ,le ventre et les seins.Il est super onctueux .

Foi o primeiro produto da marca que comprei. Surpreendeu imenso. O perfume é ótimo, mas acima de tudo deixa a pele muito bem hidratada. Comprei a embalagem mais pequena que deu para cerca de 2 semanas. Nesse espaço de tempo fiquei com a pele muito bem hidratada (normalmente não uso qualquer tipo de creme) e sedosa. Penso que o facto de tornar a pele mais lisa (pelo menos é a sensação que deixa ao toque) faz com que a pele pareça (ou fique) mais tonificada e atenue a celulite (não tenho muita, mas parece que ficou melhor depois do creme). Quando este acabou decidi comprar o Sol de Janeiro Beija flor. Até que chegasse (cerca de 10 dias de intervalo) não usei qualquer outro creme e mesmo com idas à praia todos os dias a pele manteve-se sempre hidratada. Fiquei fã da marca (o Beija Flor também é muito bom), pelo que acho que vale o preço.
